favourite.article: Hallelujah for Christ and the church!
Yes it's here that He ended His search! We're home in the church!

Never been touched by a hymn the ways this one touches me. Oh yes Praise Him we have ended our search in the Church. Yes I have found home in the Church. I am rejoicing with the brothers in his Glory. Lord I Love You.
There is no such place like home sweet home in the church where I/we belong. This is our controlling vision. Hallelujah for Christ and the church.
Oh when we walk in Christ eventually we will find that there is no genuine home except for being in the church life! How we need to be with the saints and blended in one Body in the church!
